page.title: 17TRAVELLING TO WORK.A SURVEY.
page.content: I interviewed 5 people I know in Lowdham to find out how they get to work. 1) A teacher at a local comprehensive school. He gets a lift in a car from a friend. 2)An office worker for Boots in Nottingham. She has a car and drives to work. 3)A prison officer at Lowdham Grange. She lives on the adjacent estate and usually walks but occasionally drives. 4)An accountant in Nottingham. He has a car and drives to work. 5)A local publican. He lives on the premises so he has no need to travel at all.
